mapper.insert: insert into record (u_id, r_name, r_describe, r_open, r_genre) values(#{u_id}, #{r_name}, #{r_describe}, #{r_open}, #{r_genre})
mapper.select: select r.*, u.*, (select count(*) from likey l where l.r_num = r.r_num ) as likeCount from record r left join upload u on (r.r_num = u.r_num)
select r.*, u.*, (select count(*) from likey l where l.r_num = r.r_num ) as likeCount from record r left join upload u on (r.r_num = u.r_num) order by likeCount desc, r.r_name desc
select r.*, u.*, (select count(*) from likey l where l.r_num = r.r_num ) as likeCount from record r left join upload u on (r.r_num = u.r_num) order by r.r_name
mapper.delete: delete r, u from record r left join upload u on (r.r_num = u.r_num) where r.r_num = #{r_num}
